title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Restriction of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Restriction of 
Certain Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

Purpose of Regulations

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The purpose for which these Regulations are made is to give effect to the
text_raw:
2. The purpose for which these Regulations are made is to give effect to the 
provisions of Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2024/232 amending 
Directive 2011/65/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 June 
2011 on the restriction of the use of certain hazardous substances in electrical 
and electronic equipment. 

Amendment of Definition
text_norm: 2 purpose regulation made give effect provision commission delegated directive (eu) 2024 232 amending directive 2011 65 eu european parliament council 8 june 2011 restriction use certain hazardous substance electrical electronic equipment amendment definition

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. Regulation 3(1) of the European Union (Restriction of Certain
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(1) of the European Union (Restriction of Certain 
Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Regulations 2012 
(S.I. No. 513 of 2012) is amended by substituting for the definition of “the 
Directive” the following: 

“ “the Directive” means European Parliament and Council Directive 
2011/65/EU on the restriction of the use of certain hazardous substances in 
electrical and electronic equipment, as amended by Commission Delegated 
Directives 2012/50/EU and 2012/51/EU of 10 October 2012 and Commission 
Delegated Directives 2014/1/EU, 2014/2/EU, 2014/3/EU, 2014/4/EU, 
2014/5/EU, 2014/6/EU, 2014/7/EU, 2014/8/EU, 2014/9/EU, 2014/10/EU, 
2014/11/EU, 2014/12/EU, 
 2014/13/EU, 2014/14/EU, 2014/15/EU and 
2014/16/EU of 18 October 2013 and Commission Delegated Directives 
2014/69/EU, 2014/70/EU, 2014/71/EU, 2014/72/EU, 2014/73/EU, 2014/74/EU, 
2014/75/EU and 2014/76/EU of 13 March 2014 and Commission Delegated 
Directives (EU) 2015/573 and (EU) 2015/574 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 30 January 2015 and Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 
2015/863 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 31 March 2015 and 
Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2016/585 of the European Parliament 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [344] 3 

and of the Council of 12 February 2016 and Commission Delegated Directives 
(EU) 2016/1028 and (EU) 2016/1029 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 19 April 2016 and Commission Delegated Directives (EU) 
2017/1975 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 7 August 2017 and

and Commission Delegated Directives (EU) 2019/169, (EU) 2019/170, (EU)

2019/176, (EU) 2019/177 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 
November 2018 and Commission Delegated Directives (EU) 2019/1845 and 
(EU) 2019/1846 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 August 2019 
and Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2020/364 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 17 December 2019 and Commission Delegated 
Directives (EU) 2020/360, (EU) 2020/361, (EU) 2020/365 and (EU) 2020/366 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 17 December 2019 and 
Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2021/647 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 15 January 2021 and Commission Delegated Directives 
(EU) 2021/1978, (EU) 2021/1979 and (EU) 2021/1980 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 11 August 2021 and Commission Delegated 
Directive (EU) 2021/884 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 8 
March 2021 and Commission Delegated Directives (EU) 2022/274, (EU) 
2022/275, (EU) 2022/276, (EU) 2022/277, (EU) 2022/278, (EU) 2022/279, (EU) 
2022/280, (EU) 2022/281, (EU) 2022/282, (EU) 2022/283, (EU) 2022/284 and 
(EU) 2022/287 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 13 December 
2021 and Commission Delegated Directives (EU) 2022/1631 and (EU) 
2022/1632 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 12 May 2022 and 
Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2023/171 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 28 October 2022 and Commission Delegated Directive 
(EU) 2023/1437 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 4 May 2023 
and Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2023/1526 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 16 May 2023 and Commission Delegated 
Directive (EU) 2024/232 of 25 October 2023;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 July, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Restriction of Certain Hazardous 
Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 
513 of 2012) in order to give effect to the provisions of Commission Delegated 
Directive (EU) 2024/232 of 25 October 2023 amending Annex III to Directive 
2011/65/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards an 
exemption for cadmium and lead in plastic profiles in electrical and electronic 
windows and doors containing recovered rigid polyvinyl chloride. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [344] 5
